title: Newly Renovated Murray River Suite Escape One Hour from Adelaide with Daily Breakfast
description:
An incredible A$45 million later, the recently redeveloped Bridgeport Hotel is the ideal escape for those seeking a luxurious break in the heart of one of South Australia's most picturesque regions. Treat yourself to a stay in the tranquil Murraylands, where a natural wonderland of wildlife, wine and watersports awaits, just one hour from Adelaide CBD.

Boasting an azure infinity pool framing sweeping vistas, a stylish restaurant showcasing the best in South Australian cuisine and an enviable address on the banks of the Murray River, this beautifully renovated abode is the perfect launchpad for exploring the Murraylands' natural attractions. Paddle a canoe through quiet backwaters, watch African wildlife roam free through the bushland setting of Monarto open-range zoo (just a 15-minute drive away) and venture further afield to lose yourself in the flora and fauna of Ngarkat Conservation Park.

As dusk approaches, head to the hotel's alfresco terrace and witness the sun slip behind the Murray River or enjoy an evening of cocktails at the Pool Bar. Whether you are seeking a weekend retreat from the bustling city or embarking on an unforgettable South Australia road trip - no visit to this pristine region is complete without a relaxing stay at Bridgeport Hotel.
